query: SELECT id, type, origin, destination, departureTime, arrivalTime, FROM_UNIXTIME(departureDate/1000) as departure_datetime FROM transportation WHERE tripId = (SELECT id FROM trips WHERE name LIKE '%Slovakia%') ORDER BY departureDate;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute SELECT id, type, origin, destination, departureTime, arrivalTime, FROM_UNIXTIME(departureDate/1000) as departure_datetime FROM transportation WHERE tripId = (SELECT id FROM trips WHERE name LIKE '%Slovakia%') ORDER BY departureDate;
